CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the maximum number of logs that can be saved in Optimization Centralized Log. If writing logs will result in exceeding this limit then logs will not be written. i.e. If this parameter is set to 1100 and each processing generates about 500 logs, then logs for 2 processing will be written successfully (2x500=100) and nothing will be written from last processing as it will result in log file size of 1500 which exceeds the allowed limit of 1100. *Max value for this will be 9999*
CustomField.label: VSLogMaxSize
